net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Re-Draw Tokens
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Resets the Draw Order on each selected token to ensure: - Larger tokens are below smaller tokens - NPC tokens are below PC tokens (GM configurable)
The draw order value is applied to a token property that may be leveraged in other macros to reset a token's draw order.
